testsuite.name: LearningProgressTrackerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #32
When the "statistics" command is entered, your program must print: "Type the name of a course to see details or 'back' to quit:", but your output was: Error: unknown command!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Learning Progress Tracker > statistics Error: unknown command!
